instruction: Create a mental health checklist for adolescents.
output:
- Exercise regularly
- Eat a nutrient-rich diet 
- Engage with hobbies
- Get enough sleep
- Surround yourself with supportive people
- Limit time on social media
- Reach out for help when feeling overwhelmed
- Practice mindfulness and relaxation techniques
- Talk to a trusted adult
- Review mental health resources available
- Make sure to prioritize self-care
- Give yourself permission to take breaks
- Establish a regular daily routine 
- Set boundaries and reinforce them
